name: Solar System (itch) (thenoseofsauron)
description:
In my version of the solar system, I added all 7 planets plus Pluto. I also layered some extra point lights with halos over the sun to create a glowing effect, and Saturn has a ring. The skybox was also changed to have a different space texture, and the speeds of the planets orbiting around the sun are to-scale based on their actual speeds. To have numbers that weren't integers for the speeds, I changed the RotateAround script to have the rotation speed as a float.

Credits:

Created by Jacob Helzner
